issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
A bug in the logic that sets the OSG URI on the SC may cause the URI to be stale. In this case the OSG URI used by the SC was http://localhost:8773/services/objectstorage. Since the OSG was hosted on a different IP, all requests made by the SC were failing.

{noformat}

                          | 
                          | application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8
                          | Tue, 04 Feb 2014 08:43:16 GMT
                          | /snapshots/"

fields.summary: Remote SC sends requests to incorrect OSG URI

comments.body:
[~swathi]

What are the steps to reproduce? Is it just having an OSG separate from the SC and creating a snapshot for example?
[~viglesias], yep thats right. A setup with the SC and OSG on different hosts should suffice

No issues found when creating snapshots or volumes from snapshots with OSG separate from the SC:

{noformat}
